text: @realDonaldTrump So, moron, if it is such a big issue for you, why did you wait until the dying months of your fourth year? Why didn’t you do it in the first few weeks? It’s a cynical way of taking your cult supporters minds off COVID-19 or to try to garnish support for@your re-election. Idiot.
